name: Sacrifice - LD43
description:
Sacrifice was made for Ludum Dare 43.  It's a zombie survival game, in its finest form.   You take control of Tim, a manic hero who is determined to save his city, even though it will certainly kill him.  How many zombies can you gun down before they eventually get the best of you?

Infinite and optimized!

Infinite and optimized, Sacrifice uses a re-spawn system that means only a certain amount of zombies can be physically in the game at any time.

Sizable Map!

Sacrifice's city is a small town, but it is plenty large for you to explore during normal gameplay.  Houses around the map can give you extra help, so make sure you are near residential zones.

Ludum Dare 43

Sacrifice was made for Ludum Dare 43, the world's biggest game jam.  It was created by one person, me.  I own all art and assets displayed in the game - except for the font, FFF Forward.

Tips!

- The enemy AI means that they congregate near 0,0 - your spawn point - it isn't recommended that you go too far.

- Go to residential zones - they give you health.  These are blue buildings - they are pretty easy to find.

- Click on the enemies - ray casting isn't in the game!

Enjoy!
